articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Jacinda Ardern calls for extra APEC meeting to navigate through COVID-19 pandemic - ABC News
articles.description: Jacinda Ardern says Friday's meeting of the 21-nation Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation forum will examine issues such as making vaccination rollouts more efficient and steps governments can take to protect jobs and economies.
articles.content:
New Zealand Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern is calling for an extraordinary meeting of APEC forum leaders to improve the Asia-Pacific region's response to COVID-19 and its economic impact.
